name: You are a cameraman at a Olympic sprint!
name_original: You are a cameraman at a Olympic sprint!
description:
This is a mini game where you control a cameraman at a sprint, you have to always capture the action and avoid the obstacles, so you have to pay attention to the athletes and the obstacles next to you at the same time!

After the sprint you can see the REPLAY! of what you recorded and your score.

Hope you enjoy and thanks for playing!

How to play

  • MOUSE MOVEMENT - CONTROL THE CAMERA
  • WASD or ARROW KEYS - MOVE THE CAMERAMAN

This game was made by johnperes for the Weekly Game Jam 158 with the theme "Vulnerable Invincible".
